pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sample Size and Power Calculations using the APPLE and SEPPLE Methods // Provides sample size and power calculations when the treatment time-lag effect is present and the lag duration is homogeneous across the individual subject. The methods used are described in Xu, Z., Zhen, B., Park, Y., Zhu, B. (2017) doi:10.1002/sim.7157.
